request.description: Get invoices for an entity group with the given filters.

query.description: Return only invoices that are payable by the entity.
Field to order invoices by. Defaults to CREATED_AT.
Direction to order invoices by. Defaults to asc.
Number of invoices to return. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

response.name: Success

request.description: Get invoice metrics for an entity group with the given filters. Invoices will be grouped by currency. If none of excludePayables, excludeReceivables, payerId, vendorId, or invoiceId status filters are provided, excludeReceivables will be set to true.

query.description: Return invoice metrics grouped by date.
Only return invoices that are not receivable by the entity. This will return only invoices that are payable by the entity.
Start date for invoice created on date filter.
End date for invoice created date filter.
Currency to filter on
Invoice status to filter on

request.description: Will archive the entity. This action cannot be undone, and the entity will no longer be available for use. The foreignId on the entity will be cleared as well.

This endpoint is used to indicate acceptance of Mercoa's terms of service for an entity. Send a request to this endpoint only after the entity has accepted the Mercoa ToS. Entities must accept Mercoa ToS before they can be send or pay invoices using Mercoa's payment rails.

originalRequest.description: This endpoint is used to indicate acceptance of Mercoa's terms of service for an entity. Send a request to this endpoint only after the entity has accepted the Mercoa ToS. Entities must accept Mercoa ToS before they can be send or pay invoices using Mercoa's payment rails.

request.description:
This endpoint is used to initiate KYB for an entity.
Send a request to this endpoint only after the entity has accepted the Mercoa ToS,
all representatives have been added, and all required fields have been filled out.

request.description:
Generate a JWT token for an entity with the given options. This token can be used to authenticate the entity in the Mercoa API and iFrame.

<Warning>We recommend using [this endpoint](/api-reference/entity/user/get-token). This will enable features such as approvals and comments.</Warning>

<Warning>We recommend using [this endpoint](/api-reference/entity/user/get-token). This will enable features such as approvals and comments.</Warning>

request.description: Get a Plaid link token for an entity. This token can be used to add or update a bank account to the entity using Plaid Link.

query.description: ID of Bank Account to update

request.description: Generate an onboarding link for the entity.

query.description: The type of onboarding link to generate. If not provided, the default is payee. The onboarding options are determined by your organization's onboarding configuration.
Expressed in seconds or a string describing a time span. The default is 24h.

originalRequest.description: Generate an onboarding link for the entity.

query.description: The type of onboarding link to generate. If not provided, the default is payee. The onboarding options are determined by your organization's onboarding configuration.
Expressed in seconds or a string describing a time span. The default is 24h.

request.description: Send an email with a onboarding link to the entity. The email will be sent to the email address associated with the entity.

query.description: The type of onboarding link to generate. If not provided, the default is payee. The onboarding options are determined by your organization's onboarding configuration.
Expressed in seconds or a string describing a time span. The default is 7 days.

The ID of the entity to connect to. If onboarding a payee, this should be the payor entity ID. If onboarding a payor, this should be the payee entity ID. If no connected entity ID is provided, the onboarding link will be for a standalone entity.

request.description: Adds an approver to the invoice. Will select the first available approver slot that is not already filled and assign the approver to it. request.description: Get a PDF of the check for the invoice. If the invoice does not have check as the disbursement method, an error will be returned. If the disbursement option for the check is set to 'MAIL', a void copy of the check will be returned. If the disbursement option for the check is set to 'PRINT', a printable check will be returned. If the invoice is NOT marked as PAID, the check will be a void copy.

If the disbursement option for the check is set to 'MAIL', a void copy of the check will be returned. If the disbursement option for the check is set to 'PRINT', a printable check will be returned. If the invoice is NOT marked as PAID, the check will be a void copy.
